channel.title: CVE Feed for OPTO 22 -- SNAP PAC S1

item.title: CVE-2023-40710|2024-09-30T19:13:20.220Z -- opto%2022 -- snap%20pac%20s1
item.description: An adversary could cause a continuous restart loop to the entire device by sending a large quantity of HTTP GET requests if the controller has the built-in web server enabled but does not have the built-in web server completely set up and configured for theÂ SNAP PAC S1 Firmware version R10.3b
